00020 #ifndef _ZCLTEMPERATUREMEASUREMENT_H_
00021 #define _ZCLTEMPERATUREMEASUREMENT_H_

00023 /*******************************************************************************
00024                    Includes section
00025 *******************************************************************************/

00029 /*******************************************************************************
00030                    Define(s) section
00031 *******************************************************************************/
00035 #define TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_MEASURED_VALUE_UNKNOWN               0x8000
00036 
00040 #define ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT 5
00041 
00045 #define ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT 0
00046 
00050 #define ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT 1
00051 
00055 #define ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT 0
00056 
00057 //Attribute Ids of Basic Cluster Information
00058 #define ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID                          CCPU_TO_LE16(0xfffd)
00059 
00062 #define ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID     CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0000)
00063 #define ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MIN_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0001)
00064 #define ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAX_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0002)
00065 #define ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_TOLERANCE_ATTRIBUTE_ID          CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0003) //optinal attr
00066 
00070 #define ZCL_DEFINE_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES(reportMin, reportMax) \
00071   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00072   DEFINE_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(measuredValue, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE | ZCL_CHECK_OTHER_ATTR, ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_S16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, reportMin, reportMax, \
00073                                             ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MIN_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAX_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID), \
00074   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(minMeasuredValue, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MIN_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID,  ZCL_S16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x954D, 0x7FFE), \
00075   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(maxMeasuredValue, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAX_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_S16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x954E, 0x7FFF), \
00076   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(tolerance, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_TOLERANCE_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x0000, 0x0800)
00077 
00078 #define ZCL_DEFINE_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES() \
00079   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID) 
00080     
00081 #define TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes) \
00082   { \
00083     .id = TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_ID, \
00084     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00085     .attributesAmount = ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00086     .attributes = (uint8_t *) (clattributes), \
00087     .commandsAmount = ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00088     .commands = NULL \
00089   }
00090 
00091 #define TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes) \
00092   { \
00093     .id = TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_ID, \
00094     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00095     .attributesAmount = ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00096     .attributes = (uint8_t *) (clattributes), \
00097     .commandsAmount = ZCL_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00098     .commands = NULL \
00099   }
00100 
00101 
00102 #define DEFINE_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes) \
00103     TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes)
00104 
00105 
00106 #define ZCL_DEFINE_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_FLASH(clattributes) ZCL_DEFINE_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER(clattributes)
00107 #define ZCL_DEFINE_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_FLASH() ZCL_DEFINE_TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_CLIENT()

00111 BEGIN_PACK
00112 typedef struct PACK {
00113   struct PACK {
00114     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00115     uint8_t type;
00116     uint8_t properties;
00117     int16_t value;
00118     ZCL_ReportTime_t reportCounter;     
00119     ZCL_ReportTime_t minReportInterval; 
00120     ZCL_ReportTime_t maxReportInterval; 
00121     int16_t reportableChange;           
00122     ZCL_ReportTime_t timeoutPeriod;     
00123     int16_t lastReportedValue;          
00124     ZCL_AttributeId_t minVal;
00125     ZCL_AttributeId_t maxVal;
00126   } measuredValue ;
00127 
00128   struct PACK {
00129     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00130     uint8_t type;
00131     uint8_t properties;
00132     int16_t value;
00133     int16_t minVal;
00134     int16_t maxVal;
00135   } minMeasuredValue ;
00136 
00137   struct PACK {
00138     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;
00139     uint8_t type;
00140     uint8_t properties;
00141     int16_t value;
00142     int16_t minVal;
00143     int16_t maxVal;
00144   } maxMeasuredValue ;
00145 
00146   struct PACK {
00147     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00148     uint8_t type;
00149     uint8_t properties;
00150     uint16_t value;
00151     uint16_t minVal;
00152     uint16_t maxVal;
00153   } tolerance ;
00154 
00155   struct PACK
00156   {
00157     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00158     uint8_t type;
00159     uint8_t properties;
00160     uint16_t value;
00161   } clusterVersion;
00162 
00163 } ZCL_TemperatureMeasurementClusterServerAttributes_t ;
00164 
00165 typedef struct PACK
00166 {
00167   struct PACK
00168   {
00169     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00170     uint8_t type;
00171     uint8_t properties;
00172     uint16_t value;
00173   } clusterVersion;
00174 
00175 } ZCL_TemperatureMeasurementClusterClientAttributes_t;
00176 
00177 END_PACK
